faq.title: Frequently Asked Question
faq.q1: What is AI-BOT liquidity cloud mining?
faq.a1: AI-BOT liquidity cloud mining is a new model of remote mining. Users can participate in mining by providing liquidity through a decentralized platform, earning income from transaction fees and block rewards without needing to own or maintain mining hardware.
faq.a2: To join, you need a compatible cryptocurrency wallet. Connect your wallet to our platform, approve the contract, and deposit your assets into the liquidity pool to start mining automatically.
faq.a3: Yield is calculated based on your share of the total liquidity pool, the volume of transactions, and the current block rewards. The higher your contribution to the pool, the greater your share of the earnings.
faq.q4: Overview of the company's business policy
faq.a4: Our policy is focused on transparency, security, and maximizing user returns. We utilize smart contracts to automate the process and ensure fairness. All transactions are verifiable on the blockchain.
faq.a5: Yes, our operations comply with the legal frameworks of the jurisdictions in which we operate. Decentralized finance and liquidity mining are innovative but legal financial activities in many parts of the world.
faq.a6: We offer various bonuses, including rewards for long-term liquidity providers, referral bonuses, and special event promotions to enhance your mining income.
faq.a7: Asset security is our top priority. We use audited smart contracts and partner with leading security firms to protect the liquidity pools. However, as with any DeFi protocol, there are inherent risks.
faq.a8: You can withdraw your earnings and your initial liquidity at any time. Simply connect your wallet, navigate to the withdrawal section, and confirm the transaction. Funds will be returned to your wallet.

msb.title: MSB Licence
msb.p1: COIN8 EX MINING core members are all from top Internet and financial companies. The platform has a professional financial-grade trading architecture and a self-developed high-concurrency memory matching trading engine. COIN8 EX MINING has obtained MSB compliance operation licenses in the United States and Canada.
msb.p2: The MSB (MoneyServiceBusiness) license is a financial license regulated by the U.S. Treasury Department and issued by the U.S. Treasury Department. It mainly regulates money service-related businesses and companies, including digital currency, virtual currency transactions, and international payment companies. Companies engaged in the above-mentioned related businesses in the United States must apply for an MSB license to operate legally.
msb.p3: The platform has successfully obtained a US license. COIN8 EX MINING has always regarded operational compliance, fast transactions, and privacy security as important strategic directions for corporate development. It has successfully obtained dual stock financial licenses in the United States and Canada, becoming an important milestone in the standardized operation and globalization of COIN8 EX MINING.
msb.p4: COIN8 EX MINING always adheres to user first and is committed to providing the most efficient, secure, and highly private asset management and trading services to users around the world. In the future, COIN8 EX MINING will continue to implement a global strategic layout and adhere to compliant operation and development.
